entries.name: extracted_comment
entries.desc: The comment content extracted from source file

entries.name: flags
entries.desc: The flags of the PO entry

entries.name: references
entries.desc: The locations where the PO entry is extracted

entries.name: translator_comment
entries.desc: The comment content created by translator (PO editor)

entries.name: new(msgid, options = {})
entries.desc: Creates a PO entry for msgid. Other valus can be specified by options.

entries.name: merge(other_entry)
entries.desc: Merges the PO entry with other_entry.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: Returns the PO entry in PO format.
